title: Can you describe your mobile phone? - Quora

response.answer_text: I own a Motorola e4+ It has 32gb internal storage , 3gb ram ,625 mediatek processor , 13 mp back camera , 8 mp front camera with flash , 5.5 inch screen , a full metal body , and the best thing about this beauty , it packs juice of 5000 mah which easily lasts for 2–2.5 days Hope I could help you in any way Have a good day :-)
